description:
Yui Komori returns to Mukami’s mansion along with Azusa.
There, she finds a badly injured Ruki lying on the bed.
He’s been injured to save Azusa.
Kou, Yuma, and Azusa explain to Yui the reason Ruki has been acting strange lately. 
One of the Mukami brothers are to become “Adam” by drinking Yui’s blood, but Ruki got frustrated when there was no sign of the awakening.
Yui stays to look after Ruki when he comes to. When asked why she’s there, Yui tell him she was brought there by Azusa.
Yui suggests telling the others his troubles, to which Ruki responds angrily but begins revealing his torment...
Source: crunchyroll
